{"id":438202845,"lang":"java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1609719621,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/438202845/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"39.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String addStrings(String num1, String num2) {\n        int carry = 0;\n        int p1 = num1.length() - 1;\n        int p2 = num2.length() - 1;\n        StringBuilder res = new StringBuilder();\n        \n        while (p2 >= 0 || p1 >= 0) {\n            int x1 = p1 >= 0 ? num1.charAt(p1) - '0' : 0;\n            int x2 = p2 >= 0 ? num2.charAt(p2) - '0' : 0;\n            int value = (x1 + x2 + carry) % 10;\n            carry = (x1 + x2 + carry) / 10;\n            res.append(value);\n            p1--;\n            p2--;\n        }\n        if (carry != 0)\n        res.append(carry);\n        \n        return res.reverse().toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
